# Example PRD: User Authentication System

This is a sample Product Requirements Document demonstrating the nelson-prd format.
Each task must have an explicit ID in the format PRD-NNN.

## High Priority

- [ ] PRD-001 Implement user registration endpoint with email validation
- [ ] PRD-002 Create login endpoint with JWT token generation
- [ ] PRD-003 Add password hashing with bcrypt

## Medium Priority

- [ ] PRD-004 Implement password reset flow with email tokens
- [ ] PRD-005 Add user profile management endpoints
- [ ] PRD-006 Create email verification system

## Low Priority

- [ ] PRD-007 Add OAuth integration for Google login
- [ ] PRD-008 Implement session management with refresh tokens
